org.fujion.chartjs.common

Class GridLineOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.chartjs.common.GridLineOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class GridLineOptions
extends Options
    Options for grid lines

    • Field Detail

      • borderDash

        @Option
public int[] borderDash
        Length and spacing of dashes on grid lines. See MDN.

      • borderDashOffset

        @Option
public Integer borderDashOffset
        Offset for line dashes. See See MDN.

      • color$array

        @Option(value="color")
public String[] color$array
        The color of the grid lines. The first color applies to the first grid line, the second to the second grid line and so on.

      • color$string

        @Option(value="color")
public String color$string
        The color of all grid lines.

        Default: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"

      • display

        @Option
public Boolean display
        If false, do not display grid lines for this axis.

        Default: true

      • drawBorder

        @Option
public Boolean drawBorder
        If true, draw border at the edge between the axis and the chart area.

        Default: true

      • drawOnChartArea

        @Option
public Boolean drawOnChartArea
        If true, draw lines on the chart area inside the axis lines. This is useful when there are multiple axes and you need to control which grid lines are drawn.

        Default: true

      • drawTicks

        @Option
public Boolean drawTicks
        If true, draw lines beside the ticks in the axis area beside the chart.

        Default: true

      • lineWidth$array

        @Option(value="lineWidth")
public int[] lineWidth$array
        Stroke width of individual grid lines.

      • lineWidth$number

        @Option(value="lineWidth")
public Integer lineWidth$number
        Stroke width of all grid lines.

        Default: 1

      • offsetGridLines

        @Option
public Boolean offsetGridLines
        If true, grid lines will be shifted to be between labels.

        Default: true for bar chart; false otherwise

      • tickMarkLength

        @Option
public Integer tickMarkLength
        Length in pixels that the grid lines will draw into the axis area.

        Default: 10

      • zeroLineBorderDash

        @Option
public int[] zeroLineBorderDash
        Length and spacing of dashes of the grid line for the first index (index 0). See MDN.

      • zeroLineBorderDashOffset

        @Option
public Integer zeroLineBorderDashOffset
        Offset for line dashes of the grid line for the first index (index 0). See See MDN.

        Default: 0

      • zeroLineColor

        @Option
public String zeroLineColor
        Stroke color of the grid line for the first index (index 0).

        Default: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)"

      • zeroLineWidth

        @Option
public Integer zeroLineWidth
        Stroke width of the grid line for the first index (index 0).

        Default: 1

    • Constructor Detail

      • GridLineOptions

        public GridLineOptions()
